description.zh-cn: 一种共享经济结合集体主义的政治思想，主张消灭生产资料私有制，并建立一个各尽所能、各取所需的生产资料公有制社会，以阶级斗争建立无阶级的社会。
description.en: A political ideology that combines a sharing economy with collectivism, advocating for the abolition of private ownership of the means of production and the establishment of a classless society with public ownership, collective production, and distribution according to the principle 'from each according to his ability, to each according to his needs'.

description.zh-cn: 德国籍犹太裔学者，其理论是现代共产主义运动的基础。
description.en: A German-born Jewish scholar whose theories form the basis of the modern communist movement.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，与卡尔·马克思共同创立了马克思主义。
description.en: A German philosopher who, along with Karl Marx, founded Marxist theory.

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思和恩格斯创立的理论体系，是科学社会主义和共产主义运动的理论基础。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, which serves as the theoretical basis for scientific socialism and the communist movement.

description.zh-cn: 俄国革命家，布尔什维克领导人，列宁主义的创立者，领导了十月革命。
description.en: A Russian revolutionary, leader of the Bolsheviks, founder of Leninism, who led the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由列宁提出的马克思主义理论，被广泛认为是马克思主义的一种继承和发展。
description.en: The Marxist theory proposed by Lenin, widely regarded as a continuation and development of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 1917年由列宁领导的布尔什维克在俄国发动的武装政变，建立了世界上第一个由马克思主义政党领导的社会主义国家。
description.en: An armed coup in Russia in 1917, led by Lenin's Bolsheviks, which established the world's first socialist state led by a Marxist party.

description.zh-cn: 俄国社会民主工党的一个派别，在列宁的领导下发动了十月革命并建立了苏维埃政权。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party which, under the leadership of Lenin, launched the October Revolution and established Soviet power.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 由布尔什维克建立的社会主义联邦国家，对20世纪的共产主义运动产生了主导性影响。
description.en: A socialist federal state founded by the Bolsheviks, which had a dominant influence on the communist movement of the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 起源于十九世纪西欧工人运动的社会政治运动，旨在建立共产主义社会。
description.en: A socio-political movement that originated from the 19th-century workers' movement in Western Europe, aiming to establish a communist society.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义和列宁主义的结合，是许多共产主义政党的官方意识形态。
description.en: The combination of Marxism and Leninism, which is the official ideology of many communist parties.

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党总书记，在其统治下形成了斯大林主义。
description.en: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, under whose rule Stalinism was formed.

description.zh-cn: 在斯大林统治下及其后，控制苏联和受苏联影响的共产主义国家的共产主义理论。
description.en: The communist theory that controlled the Soviet Union and Soviet-influenced communist states during and after the rule of Joseph Stalin.

nodes.id: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

zh-cn: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

description.zh-cn: 苏联革命家，基于马克思主义和列宁主义提出了托洛茨基主义。
description.en: A Soviet revolutionary who proposed Trotskyism based on Marxism and Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 由托洛茨基提出的马克思主义理论，主张世界范围内的永久革命，与斯大林主义和毛泽东主义有很大不同。
description.en: The Marxist theory proposed by Trotsky, advocating for permanent revolution on a worldwide scale, which differs significantly from Stalinism and Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人，其理论形成了毛泽东思想，领导了中国的共产主义革命和建设。
description.en: Leader of the Chinese Communist Party, whose theories formed Mao Zedong Thought, and who led China's communist revolution and construction.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东提出的理论，与传统马克思列宁主义相比更重视发动农民。
description.en: The theory proposed by Mao Zedong, which places more emphasis on mobilizing the peasantry compared to traditional Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在20世纪50年代后期发动的经济和社会运动，对中国的发展造成严重破坏。
description.en: An economic and social campaign launched by Mao Zedong in the late 1950s, which caused severe damage to China's development.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在20世纪60年代发动的政治运动，对中国的发展造成严重破坏。
description.en: A political movement launched by Mao Zedong in the 1960s, which caused severe damage to China's development.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，在改革开放后对毛泽东的许多政策和思想进行了修正，推动形成了中国特色社会主义理论体系。
description.en: A Chinese politician who revised many of Mao Zedong's policies and ideas after the Reform and Opening-up, promoting the formation of the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

nodes.id: 中国特色社会主义理论体系

zh-cn: 中国特色社会主义理论体系
en: Theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平推动下，对毛泽东思想修正后逐渐形成的理论体系。
description.en: A theoretical system that gradually formed under the impetus of Deng Xiaoping after the revision of Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚劳动党第一书记，其思想和实践被称为霍查主义。
description.en: First Secretary of the Party of Labour of Albania, whose thoughts and practices are known as Hoxhaism.

description.zh-cn: 由恩维尔·霍查提出的思想，以“真正的斯大林主义者”自居，并谴责毛泽东的“三个世界”理论。
description.en: The ideology proposed by Enver Hoxha, which claimed to be 'true Stalinism' and condemned Mao Zedong's 'Three Worlds Theory'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提出的关于国际关系和世界格局的理论。
description.en: A theory proposed by Mao Zedong concerning international relations and the world structure.

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国领导人，其思想和实践被称为铁托主义。
description.en: Leader of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia, whose thoughts and practices are known as Titoism.

nodes.id: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 由铁托领导的欧洲社会主义国家，较早与苏联决裂。
description.en: A European socialist state led by Tito, which broke with the Soviet Union early on.

description.zh-cn: 德国马克思主义理论家，其思想形成了卢森堡主义。
description.en: A German Marxist theorist whose ideas formed Luxemburgism.

description.zh-cn: 罗莎·卢森堡的马克思主义理论，反对列宁主义的威权主义思想。
description.en: The Marxist theory of Rosa Luxemburg, which opposes the authoritarian ideas of Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 一本旨在记录共产主义政权下政治迫害和屠杀的书籍。
description.en: A book that aims to document political persecutions and mass killings under communist regimes.

description.zh-cn: 美国前总统，曾公开谴责共产主义和社会主义。
description.en: Former President of the United States who has publicly condemned communism and socialism.

nodes.id: 弗兰克-瓦尔特·施泰因迈尔

zh-cn: 弗兰克-瓦尔特·施泰因迈尔

description.zh-cn: 德国总统，曾公开表示马克思主义为德国和东欧带来浩劫。
description.en: President of Germany who has publicly stated that Marxism brought catastrophe to Germany and Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，领导了中国的共产主义革命和建设。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which led the country's communist revolution and construction.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思是马克思主义理论的创始人。
description.en: Karl Marx is the founder of Marxist theory.

description.zh-cn: 恩格斯与卡尔·马克思共同创立了马克思主义。
description.en: Friedrich Engels co-founded Marxism with Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 现代共产主义运动以卡尔·马克思的理论为基础。
description.en: The modern communist movement is based on the theory of Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 列宁主义是由列宁提出的马克思主义理论。
description.en: Leninism is the Marxist theory proposed by Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 列宁主义被广泛认为是马克思主义的一种继承和发展。
description.en: Leninism is widely regarded as a continuation and development of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 列宁领导下的布尔什维克发动了十月革命。
description.en: The Bolsheviks under Lenin's leadership launched the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克发动了十月革命，建立了苏维埃政权。
description.en: The Bolsheviks launched the October Revolution and established Soviet power.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命被认为是二十世纪共产主义运动的序幕，触发了此后共产主义运动在全球范围的扩张。
description.en: The October Revolution is considered the prologue to the 20th-century communist movement, triggering its subsequent global expansion.

description.zh-cn: 根据毛泽东的说法，“十月革命一声炮响，为我们送来了马克思列宁主义”。
description.en: According to Mao Zedong, 'A gunshot from the October Revolution brought us Marxism-Leninism'.

description.zh-cn: 苏联由布尔什维克控制下的俄罗斯、乌克兰、白俄罗斯和南高加索联邦共同组成。
description.en: The Soviet Union was formed by Russia, Ukraine, Byelorussia, and the Transcaucasian Federation, all under Bolshevik control.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林主义是在斯大林统治下形成的共产主义理论。
description.en: Stalinism is the communist theory formed under the rule of Stalin.

relationships.source: 列夫·达维多维奇·托洛茨基

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基基于马克思主义和列宁主义提出了托洛茨基主义。
description.en: Trotsky proposed Trotskyism based on Marxism and Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义的政治信条与斯大林主义有很大的不同，反斯大林的托洛茨基主义者认为斯大林主义是反革命政策。
description.en: The political tenets of Trotskyism are very different from Stalinism, and anti-Stalinist Trotskyists consider Stalinism a counter-revolutionary policy.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基主义的政治信条与毛泽东主义有很大的不同。
description.en: The political tenets of Trotskyism are very different from Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 霍查主义是指恩维尔·霍查的思想和实践。
description.en: Hoxhaism refers to the thoughts and practices of Enver Hoxha.

description.zh-cn: 霍查以“真正的斯大林主义者”自居。
description.en: Hoxha considered himself a 'true Stalinist'.

description.zh-cn: 霍查强烈谴责毛泽东的“三个世界”理论是修正主义。
description.en: Hoxha strongly condemned Mao Zedong's 'Three Worlds Theory' as revisionism.

description.zh-cn: 霍查主义认为毛泽东思想是农民的民粹主义思想而非无产阶级革命思想。
description.en: Hoxhaism considers Mao Zedong Thought to be a peasant populist ideology rather than a proletarian revolutionary one.

relationships.source: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 由铁托领导的南斯拉夫较早地与苏联决裂。
description.en: Yugoslavia, led by Tito, broke with the Soviet Union early on.

description.zh-cn: 卢森堡主义是罗莎·卢森堡的马克思主义思想。
description.en: Luxemburgism is the Marxist thought of Rosa Luxemburg.

description.zh-cn: 卢森堡主义反对列宁主义的威权主义思想。
description.en: Luxemburgism opposes the authoritarian ideas of Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东思想是中国共产党领导人毛泽东的理论。
description.en: Mao Zedong Thought is the theory of Chinese Communist Party leader Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国共产党的领导人，领导了中国的共产主义革命和建设。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the leader of the Chinese Communist Party, leading China's communist revolution and construction.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在20世纪50年代后期发动了大跃进。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the Great Leap Forward in the late 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在20世纪60年代发动了文化大革命。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the Cultural Revolution in the 1960s.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动对中国的发展造成严重破坏。
description.en: The Great Leap Forward movement caused severe damage to China's development.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命对中国的发展造成严重破坏。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution caused severe damage to China's development.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，邓小平对毛泽东的许多政策及思想进行了修正。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Deng Xiaoping revised many of Mao Zedong's policies and ideas.

relationships.target: 中国特色社会主义理论体系

description.zh-cn: 邓小平推动形成了中国特色社会主义理论体系。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping promoted the formation of the theory of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 《共产主义黑皮书》旨在记录并谴责共产主义政权下的人权侵犯行为，估计造成了八千五百万人至一亿人死亡。
description.en: The Black Book of Communism aims to document and condemn human rights violations under communist regimes, estimating between 85 and 100 million deaths.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普谴责称，几乎所有的社会主义或共产主义都导致了苦难、腐败和腐朽，世界上所有国家都应该抵制社会主义。
description.en: U.S. President Donald Trump condemned that nearly all socialism or communism has led to suffering, corruption, and decay, and that all nations of the world should resist socialism.

relationships.source: 弗兰克-瓦尔特·施泰因迈尔

description.zh-cn: 德国总统施泰因迈尔在访问中国时发表演讲，提醒中国年轻人马克思主义曾经为德国和东欧带来浩劫。
description.en: During a visit to China, German President Steinmeier gave a speech reminding young Chinese people that Marxism once brought catastrophe to Germany and Eastern Europe.
